amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of the text of those amendments contained in part D of House Report 105-544 which are printed on pages H3666-H3674 in the Congressional Record for May 21, 1998.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, consisting of the following amendments printed in House Rept. 105-544, offered en bloc: Part D amendments No. 1-12, 13 (modified), 14-18, 21, 22 (modified), 23-38, and the Everett amendment, made in order by unanimous consent on May 20, 1998.

action.text: Spence amendment (A008) modified by unanimous consent. Mr. Barr asked unanimous consent that the amendment printed as amendment No. 24 in part D of House Rept. 105-544 and included in the Spence en bloc amendments be modified to include a sense of Congress provision regarding establishment of a counter-drug center in Panama.
On agreeing to the Spence amendments (A008) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
